snippet: A 1937 Delahaye roadster once owned by the collector Malcolm Pray went for a weekend record of $6.6 million at RM’s auction in Amelia Island, Fla.
abstract: Coveted 1937 Delahaye roadster once owned by the collector Malcolm Pray sets weekend record of $6.6 million at RM’s auction in Amelia Island, Fla.
lead_paragraph: A 1937 Delahaye roadster once owned by the collector Malcolm Pray went for a weekend record of $6.6 million at RM’s auction in Amelia Island, Fla.

headline.main: A World’s Fair Visit, Not Over Yet
headline.print_headline: A World’s Fair Visit, Not Over Yet
